name: elegant scrollbars
description: Simple scrollbars defined entirely with CSS (no images). This example is a basic/flat 2-color scheme in blue. Scroll buttons are placed together in the bottom right corner. Colors, widths, and heights are easy to change to your liking. Works fine in Fx25 -- don't know about earlier releases.

additional_info: Note: The code for this style has not been updated [by me] since Nov. 7, 2013. It was auto-updated at some point in time afterwards by the site admin, along with numerous other styles, due to a change in the way Stylish handled "agent_sheet" styles in order to add the "/* AGENT_SHEET */" comment at the top of the style(s)--the comment actually being a flag for Stylish. Due to a site flaw, an update to this Additional Info section made earlier this month by me resulted in the Updated date being updated incorrectly to the then current date. There are some additional comments in the code. This code is for Firefox and Thunderbird but could easily be adapted for other applications. If you want just the cursors, then try my extension at AMO. Updates 2013-11-04: minor update to hide disabled scroll buttons; added some optional code (commented out) to hide the bar (aka 'tray' or 'track' or 'slider') when it's not hovered. 2013-11-07: added cursor feedback (cursor changes due to hover/action--pointer for scroll buttons, "grabby" hand for thumb, "resize" arrows for bar/tray)
